name: db75248e-325a-4c21-9e6b-056944667d7d
goal: for creation od cloud vpc with given projectid

steps.text: Greet the user and ask how can i help you today .

When the customer says "create vpc" then ask user for project id then reply user  "I understand you want to create a VPC in "project" with default value in Google Cloud. Do you want to proceed?" using the "respond" action.
If the customer confirms (e.g., says "yes"), notify them with: "Okay, starting VPC creation now." using the "notify" action.
After the VPC creation, thank the user with: "Thank you for your business! Your VPC has been created under this project id. Ask Anyother help that I can do? If no say thank you!
